EmailTemplate.name: PFEC_Feb2017.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Portal: It's Ready For You
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://www.honeywellaidc.com/pages/SiteLanguages.aspx]]> MYAEROSPACE PORTAL:  IT’S READY FOR YOU Dear Honeywell Customer, Recently, we told you about exciting new changes to your Honeywell MyAerospace Portal. It’s your home to place and track your parts and repair orders. Not only have we improved the way you can submit and view your orders, but more parts are now available on your MyAerospace Portal <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>.   Please log into MyAerospace <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]> for all your future parts quoting, ordering, and tracking needs. To get started, you can view updates and tutorials here <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us/myaerospace-updates]]>.   We are making these improvements to move your order from placed to processed to delivered much faster. MyAerospace gives you immediate confirmation that your order has been placed and allows you to track its progress from any computer, tablet, or smartphone.   Please ensure that starting April 1, you use the MyAerospace Portal for your order management. MyAerospace will open a world of convenience, dependability, and speed for your company.    Learn more about MyAerospace Portal updates here <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us/myaerospace-updates]]>. © 2017 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]>  <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]>  <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation" target="_blank">  Terms of Use <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://www.honeywell.com/privacy-statement]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]>
